message.content: {"id": "2940", "title": "Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Busy cursor not shown during checkbox update", "description": "When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) and the busy cursor is not shown. This can mislead the user into thinking that the update is not happening.", "OB": "Currently, the busy cursor is not displayed when updating the checkbox state of the table in the Export Zip feature.", "EB": "The Export Zip feature should display a busy cursor during the update of checkbox states to indicate that the update is in progress.", "SR": "Add code to display a busy cursor during the update of checkbox states in the Export Zip feature."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '2940', 'title': 'Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)', 'description': 'Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'It takes a log time ( 30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table Busy cursor should be shownNOTES: ', 'SR': ''}
